<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get a data source for a given account</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/grafana/api/datasources/name/{metric_account_name}/summary"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get a data source for a given account. <br /> 
*Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.*


## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"path","name":"metric_account_name","schema":{"description":"Logz.io metric account name","type":"string"},"required":true}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful query

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"integer"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"integer","example":123,"description":"Data source Id"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"uid"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"DCFaFyDnk","description":"Data source UID"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"cluster6_metrics","description":"Data source name"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"type"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"prometheus","description":"Enum for the data source type. Can be eithern prometheus or elasticsearch."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"database"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":123456,"description":"Metrics account ID"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"id\": 123,\n  \"uid\": \"DCFaFyDnk\",\n  \"name\": \"cluster6_metrics\",\n  \"type\": \"prometheus\",\n  \"database\": 123456\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"404"} value={"404"}><div>
